Activity: Log in to the workstation. Review emails and project documentation.
Refine the data quality report template based on feedback from yesterday's testing. Focus on improving clarity, visual appeal, and accessibility.
Implement the final version of the data quality report generation script. Add error handling and logging capabilities. Document the script's functionality and usage.
Generate a sample weekly data quality report using the script. Review the report carefully to ensure all metrics are calculated correctly and displayed accurately.

Email @qatest-1, @qatest-2 to schedule a meeting to get feedback on the draft data quality report and the generation script. @PEOPLE: ['qatest-1', 'qatest-2'] Topic: Data Quality Report Review and Validation
Lunch Break. Go out for a walk.
Meeting with @qatest-1, @qatest-2 to review the sample data quality report and the generation script. Address any concerns or questions they have. Document their feedback and suggestions.
Incorporate the feedback from the quality assurance team into the data quality report and the generation script. Retest the script to ensure all issues have been resolved.
Finalize the weekly improvement targets for each data quality metric. Document the rationale for each target and the method used to set it.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the data quality metrics, the weekly improvement targets, and the data quality reporting process. Prepare to share this with relevant stakeholders next week.
Review the day's progress and make a list of remaining tasks for the week.
